item.title: Back-to-School Shopping Hits $40B: 3 Retail Stocks to Watch Now
item.description: Back-to-school spending tops $40B in 2025. Discover which retail stocks—Walmart, Costco, Lululemon—are best positioned for Q4 growth.

item.title: Alphabet Stock Surges After Dodging Harsh Antitrust Remedies
item.description: Judge Mehta ruled Google can keep Chrome and Android, with only narrower restrictions on contracts and data-sharing, avoiding the harshest remedies.

item.title: Why Qualcomm Is Outperforming NVIDIA After Months of Lagging
item.description: Qualcomm’s recent outperformance of NVIDIA reflects growing demand, bullish analyst calls, and attractive fundamentals. But can it continue?

item.title: Wall Street Punishes Dell's Record Quarter: Why They Are Wrong
item.description: Dell's stock drop overlooks its explosive AI revenue growth, offering a chance to invest in a leader of the AI infrastructure build-out.

item.title: Taiwan Semiconductor Falls on China News—Buy The Dip?
item.description: Taiwan Semiconductor has been restricted from sending and selling equipment to China, sending the stock lower for a dip buying opportunity.
